page.title: 15THE SITE; ABBEY WOOD
page.content:
The area where Abbey Wood and Thamesmead now stand was originally grazing and camping land for gypsy travellers. After building the Abbey Wood Estate, Thistlebrook, the largest permanent travellers' site in Britain, was opened.
**************************************
I like living on the site because you have got company. I play a lot with my friends. The games I play are Â£he', hide'n'seek, and I play on my Atari game. I live in a trailer. My trailer is 54 feet long, the longest trailer on the site.
Albert-John Moore Age 10yrs.
